author: donaldp
msg: PathConvert does not allow NetWare as a targetOS. There was also a problem with the logic of PathConvert treating everything that did not have a targetOS=Windows as UNIX, where in this case the Windows assumptions are actually more correct for NetWare. �(The assumptions are the type of classpath separator, ";" on Windows and NetWare, and the directory path separator, and NetWare can deal with either "/", or "\\" equally well).

author: conor
msg: Ignore NoSuchMethod exceptions when looking for setProject in non
Task classes being used as tasks

author: donaldp
msg: Updated documentation for Move to reflect the ability to create filesets with single files that move to another file.
